0.text: Innate: Pantheon generates a stack of Mortal Will whenever he lands a basic attack  on-hit or casts an ability, stacking up to a maximum of 5. At 5 stacks, Pantheon's next basic ability consumes the stacks to become empowered with an additional effect.

1.text: Pantheon gains maximum stacks of Mortal Will upon starting the game, completing a  Recall channel, and respawning.

0.text: Active: Pantheon  charges while being  slowed by 10% for up to 4 seconds to increase Comet Spear's  range after 0.35 seconds of channeling. Comet Spear can be recast within the duration.

1.text: Recast: Pantheon hurls his spear in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit,  increased against enemies below 20% of their maximum health but reduced by 50% against enemies beyond the first. Total damage is reduced by 30% against  minions and  monsters.

2.text: Releasing the ability within 0.35 seconds causes Pantheon to instead thrust his spear in the target direction, dealing the same physical damage to enemies hit and  refunding 60% of Comet Spear's cooldown. The thrust's damage is not reduced against enemies beyond the first.

3.text: If the charge is  interrupted or completes without reactivation, Comet Spear is cancelled and the ability is put on  full cooldown but refunds  half the mana cost.

4.text: Mortal Will: Comet Spear gains 20 − 240 (based on level) (+ 115% bonus AD) bonus physical damage, affected by the previous damage reductions. Consumes the stacks upon recasting.

0.text: Active: Pantheon  leaps to the front of the target enemy's location and, if the target is within 800 units upon arrival, he deals physical damage and  stuns them for 1 second.

1.text: Mortal Will: Pantheon's next basic attack within 4 seconds has a cast time and strikes the target 3 times over a brief period, dealing 40% − 55% (based on level) AD physical damage per hit, up to 120% − 165% (based on level) AD. Each hit is affected by  critical strike modifiers and applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

2.text: Empowered Shield Vault  resets Pantheon's basic attack timer. Pantheon will attempt to basic attack the target at the end of the leap.

0.text: Active: Pantheon braces his shield in the target direction and  channels for 1.5 seconds, during which he becomes  invulnerable against non- turret damage dealt by enemies from the target direction. He also continually performs strikes in a cone in front of him, dealing 8.3% AD physical damage every 0.125 seconds to enemies hit, reduced by 50% against  minions and up to 100% AD total physical damage against each target.

1.text: Aegis Assault can be recast after 0.3 seconds, and does so automatically after the duration. Aegis Assault's channel cannot be  interrupted by  crowd control.

2.text: Recast: Pantheon slams with his shield in a cone in front of him, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.

3.text: Mortal Will: Pantheon gains  60% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds after recasting.

0.text: Passive: Pantheon gains  armor penetration.

1.text: Active: Pantheon  channels for 2 seconds, then leaps high into the air,  vanishing and becoming  immune to crowd control until he reappears. While in the air, Pantheon  channels again for 2.2 seconds and grants  sight around the target location 0.5 seconds into the channel.

2.text: After 0.8 seconds into the channel, Pantheon prepares for landing by hurling his spear to the target location over 0.2 seconds that deals 40 − 190 (based on  Comet Spear's rank) (+ 115% bonus AD) physical damage to enemies near its landing point and  slows them by 50% for 2 seconds.

3.text: Over the remaining 1.2 seconds, Pantheon crashes down and creates a shockwave alongside himself that travels toward the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies hit, decreased by up to 50% for those hit at the edge of the area. Upon completion of the channel, Pantheon  reappears at the target location and gains full stacks of  Mortal Will.

4.text: Grand Starfall is put on a  30-second cooldown if the first channel is canceled.

5.text: Grand Starfall will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+18 Lethality (11.2 − 18 (based on level) armor penetration)
+7% omnivamp

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ever Rising Moon: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals them ( 6% / 3%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a shield for ( 160 / 80) (+ ( 35% / 17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 8 / 16) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 4% armor penetration, and 5 bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – EVER RISING MOON: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals them ( 6% /  3%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a  shield for ( 160 /  80) (+ ( 35% /  17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 8 /  16) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  +  750

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CARVE: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability haste
+45 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs ( 200 / 150) (+ ( 225% / 168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).
Unique: Triggering Lifeline also grants 10% omnivamp for 5 seconds. After 2 seconds into the duration, taking or dealing damage refreshes this effect to 3 seconds.

0.text: Innate: Pantheon generates a stack of Mortal Will whenever he lands a basic attack  on-hit or casts an ability, stacking up to a maximum of 5. At 5 stacks, Pantheon's next basic ability consumes the stacks to become empowered with an additional effect.

1.text: Pantheon gains maximum stacks of Mortal Will upon starting the game, completing a  Recall channel, and respawning.

0.text: Active: Pantheon  charges while being  slowed by 10% for up to 4 seconds to increase Comet Spear's  range after 0.35 seconds of channeling. Comet Spear can be recast within the duration.

1.text: Recast: Pantheon hurls his spear in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit,  increased against enemies below 20% of their maximum health but reduced by 50% against enemies beyond the first. Total damage is reduced by 30% against  minions and  monsters.

2.text: Releasing the ability within 0.35 seconds causes Pantheon to instead thrust his spear in the target direction, dealing the same physical damage to enemies hit and  refunding 60% of Comet Spear's cooldown. The thrust's damage is not reduced against enemies beyond the first.

3.text: If the charge is  interrupted or completes without reactivation, Comet Spear is cancelled and the ability is put on  full cooldown but refunds  half the mana cost.

4.text: Mortal Will: Comet Spear gains 20 − 240 (based on level) (+ 115% bonus AD) bonus physical damage, affected by the previous damage reductions. Consumes the stacks upon recasting.

0.text: Active: Pantheon  leaps to the front of the target enemy's location and, if the target is within 800 units upon arrival, he deals physical damage and  stuns them for 1 second.

1.text: Mortal Will: Pantheon's next basic attack within 4 seconds has a cast time and strikes the target 3 times over a brief period, dealing 40% − 55% (based on level) AD physical damage per hit, up to 120% − 165% (based on level) AD. Each hit is affected by  critical strike modifiers and applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

2.text: Empowered Shield Vault  resets Pantheon's basic attack timer. Pantheon will attempt to basic attack the target at the end of the leap.

0.text: Active: Pantheon braces his shield in the target direction and  channels for 1.5 seconds, during which he becomes  invulnerable against non- turret damage dealt by enemies from the target direction. He also continually performs strikes in a cone in front of him, dealing 8.3% AD physical damage every 0.125 seconds to enemies hit, reduced by 50% against  minions and up to 100% AD total physical damage against each target.

1.text: Aegis Assault can be recast after 0.3 seconds, and does so automatically after the duration. Aegis Assault's channel cannot be  interrupted by  crowd control.

2.text: Recast: Pantheon slams with his shield in a cone in front of him, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.

3.text: Mortal Will: Pantheon gains  60% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds after recasting.

0.text: Passive: Pantheon gains  armor penetration.

1.text: Active: Pantheon  channels for 2 seconds, then leaps high into the air,  vanishing and becoming  immune to crowd control until he reappears. While in the air, Pantheon  channels again for 2.2 seconds and grants  sight around the target location 0.5 seconds into the channel.

2.text: After 0.8 seconds into the channel, Pantheon prepares for landing by hurling his spear to the target location over 0.2 seconds that deals 40 − 190 (based on  Comet Spear's rank) (+ 115% bonus AD) physical damage to enemies near its landing point and  slows them by 50% for 2 seconds.

3.text: Over the remaining 1.2 seconds, Pantheon crashes down and creates a shockwave alongside himself that travels toward the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies hit, decreased by up to 50% for those hit at the edge of the area. Upon completion of the channel, Pantheon  reappears at the target location and gains full stacks of  Mortal Will.

4.text: Grand Starfall is put on a  30-second cooldown if the first channel is canceled.

5.text: Grand Starfall will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
